admreg: Europe and Central Asia,Europe and Central Asia

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would comprise construction
            of the Buk Bijela hydropower station on the Drina River
            consisting of a rockfill dam with clay core, spillways,
            intakes and pressure tunnels, a cavern-type power house with
            four 112.5-MW turbo-generators and accessory equipment and a
            switchyard. A compensating reservoir with a concrete dam
            would be constructed about 10 km downstream to regulate
            discharge waters. Consulting services would be provided for
            assistance with administration, accounting and training, and
            for special engineering studies, if needed.
